hadiths.text: It was narrated that Sa'eed bin Al-Musayyab said:"Umar said to Suhaib: 'Why do I see you wearing a ring of gold?' He said: 'One who was better than you saw it and did not criticize it.' He said: 'Who was that?' He said: 'The Messenger of Allah [SAW]

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي خَاتَمِ الذَّهَبِ لِلرِّجَالِ
chapter.eng-name: Concession for Gold Rings for Men
